title: Getting Banned From Our $$$ Resort
description:
Back from their first trip in over a year, Lauren and Jeremy recap the highs and lows of their travels. Lauren goes head to head (and spoiler alert: loses) against a border agent and Jeremy admits fault to the biggest drama of the trip.

Visit ThriveCausemetics.com/wild for 15% off your first order!
For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com and enter code wild950!
As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/wt9
To get 15% off your next gift, go to UncommonGoods.com/wild.
